fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Save someone from eternal damnation at night.
- Choose a motherfucker to hit tonight during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone has been given a post restriction relating to posting "OwO" or "UwU" or any such variants, remove this post restriction by saving them from damnation.
- If your day target's role contains the letters U and/or W, your attack will be upgraded to Powufuw (flavored Powerful)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure that all players alive at the end of the game do not have either of the letter U or W in their role name **AND** make sure that nobody alive at the end of the game has a ridiculous post restriction.
